TopicTitle: Is orbit around mun ~ 10km supposed to decay?

Articles.Content:
I'm seeing a low orbit get lower and lower.

Is this normal?    shouldn't I be able to orbit at...say... 10km?

Hello DanW and welcome to the forum!

Your thread has been moved here from KSP2 Discussion.

This is a known bug which the dev team has acknowledged they are working on.  The fix is, unfortunately, not in the lastest update.


Happy landings!
literally game breaking and no news if or when it will be fixed.

5 hours ago, apoch1999 said:

literally game breaking and no news if or when it will be fixed.

I know it's annoying but it's literally not game breaking. You can continue playing that save after the bug happens.

If the game caused Windows to crash every time it happened, or it corrupted the save file so it was unplayable, that would be game breaking.
